--- title: CLI tools keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Command line tools" ---

geoget_ladsweb[source]

geoget_ladsweb(product:"Name of the product", collection:"Collection number", tstart:"Start of serach window yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS", tend:"End of search windo yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS", bbox:"Bounding box in format left bottom right top", email:"ladsweb user email", auth:"ladsweb user authentication key (go to Profile>App Keys)", path_save:"Path to save the outputs of the request", bands:"List of bands to download", coordsOrTiles:"coordsOrTiles parameter"='coords', daynight:"Select images for Day, Night or both"='DNB', repName:"Reprojection type"='GEO', repPixSize:"Pixel size in units depending on the reprojection type"=0.01, repResample:"Resampling method"='bilinear', doMosaic:""='False')
